definition: having a list of ancestors as proof of being a purebred animal, ancestry of a purebred animal
details:
adjective
- having a list of ancestors as proof of being a purebred animal
= synonyms: pedigreed, pureblood, pureblooded, thoroughbred
noun
- ancestry of a purebred animal
= synonyms: bloodline
- line of descent of a purebred animal
- the descendants of one individual
= synonyms: descent
